Just bring a tag close to your device
The contents of this tag will only be accessible to you
This tag will be accessible by everyone
Touchcloud does not support the sharing of folders. You can indivudally share each file OR compress the folder and then shared it through Touchcloud

Touchcloud cannot find any application to open the tagged file
The tag you are trying to open was made private by its owner

Why this object or location for your cloud data?
What kind of data did you tag?
Did you have this data in the cloud before installing Touchcloud?
